ModMetaData.name: Growing Zone Priorities
ModMetaData.author: Ilyaki
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to set priorities for which growing zone to sow and harvest first. Also works on plant pots, hydroponics, etc.
Save friendly!
v1.1.0.0 Changelog: - Fixed bug where colonists would plant the wrong plant. - Massively simplified the code, so less performance impact.
